welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hornchurch, a charming town known for its historic buildings, beautiful gardens, and vibrant community. We invite you to explore our picturesque streets, enjoy the local shops and restaurants, and soak up the friendly atmosphere. We hope you have a wonderful time here!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Southend Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal of Southend Airport, handling freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is connected to the main terminal and primarily handles low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium options are also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The third oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used for long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by British Airways and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, with premium options for faster speeds.
